mapper.update:
update p2p_customer
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_PASSWORD = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECOMMEND_CODE = #{recommendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD_ERROR_COUNTER = #{pwdErrorCounter,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_PWD = #{payPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_SOURCE = #{regSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_DEVICE = #{regDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_OS = #{regOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFEREE = #{referee,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_KIND = #{custKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVITY_SRC = #{activitySrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELONG_PLATFORM = #{belongPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANDOM_NO = #{randomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESET_TIME = #{resetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUTO_PWD = #{autoPwd,jdbcType=CHAR},
AUTO_INVEST_AUTH = #{autoInvestAuth,jdbcType=CHAR},
DIREC_TRF_AUTH = #{direcTrfAuth,jdbcType=CHAR},
where LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update p2p_customer set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PASSWORD = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOMMEND_CODE = #{recommendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD_ERROR_COUNTER = #{pwdErrorCounter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_PWD = #{payPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_SOURCE = #{regSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DEVICE = #{regDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_OS = #{regOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFEREE = #{referee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_KIND = #{custKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVITY_SRC = #{activitySrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BELONG_PLATFORM = #{belongPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANDOM_NO = #{randomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESET_TIME = #{resetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUTO_PWD = #{autoPwd,jdbcType=CHAR}, AUTO_INVEST_AUTH = #{autoInvestAuth,jdbcType=CHAR}, DIREC_TRF_AUTH = #{direcTrfAuth,jdbcType=CHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
